translations: n.[法]继承人（successor 的复数形式）；继任者

phrs.translation: 法定继承人；合法继承人

sentences.sentence: He set out several principles that he hopes will guide his successors.
sentences.translation: 他制定出了几条原则,希望能指导其继任者。

sentences.sentence: Our cause is flourishing and has no lack of successors.
sentences.translation: 我们的事业兴旺发达，后继有人。

sentences.sentence: In literature, Greek writers were consciously used as models by their Latin successors.
sentences.translation: 在文学方面，希腊作家被他们的拉丁后继者有意识地当作榜样。
